Compute Pseudotime-Aware MI Networks (per pseudotime bin)

Source: R/pseudotime.R
compute_pseudotime_mi_network.Rd

Compute Pseudotime-Aware MI Networks (per pseudotime bin)

Usage

compute_pseudotime_mi_network(
  seurat_obj,
  cluster_id,
  cluster_field,
  pseudotime_col,
  assay_name = "RNA",
  counts_layer = "counts",
  data_layer = "data",
  n_bins = 5,
  min_cells_bin = 75,
  top_n_genes = 5000,
  max_cells = 1500,
  min_expr_pct = 0.05,
  n_cores = parallel::detectCores() - 1,
  bin_method = "quantile"
)

Arguments

seurat_obj

Seurat object

cluster_id

Cluster ID value

cluster_field

Metadata column name for clusters

pseudotime_col

Metadata column name for pseudotime

assay_name

Assay name (default: "RNA")

counts_layer

Layer/slot for counts (default: "counts")

data_layer

Layer/slot for normalized data (default: "data")

n_bins

Number of pseudotime bins

min_cells_bin

Minimum cells per bin

top_n_genes

Top variable genes

max_cells

Max cells (subsampling inside get_expr_data)

min_expr_pct

Minimum expression percentage

n_cores

Cores

bin_method

"quantile" or "equal_width"

Value

Named list of igraph objects per bin (NULL where skipped)
